name: Ironblood
description:
Sumary You are found by two strangers and dragged in an old chapel surrounded by strange creatures and your only path leads to the Mist. The iron purges the mist, the blood mixed with the souls of the afflicted. You feel as one of them though you're healty and sadly this journey leads to misfortune as death waits for you in many battles as magic becomes a taboo.  Features
  • A simple horror story in a medieval dark themed enviroment. Bizarre creatures awaits as your allies fall in doubt about the main event!
  • Extreme Agility Turn,  High Reaction rewards you or your enemy with an extra action at the end of the round.
  • Customize your party playstyle with Weapons and Relics, they have skills on their own, flexible system with dozens of combinations.
  • Upgrade your party with items, traits and status upgrades talking to the dead.
